br.pucrio.inf.les.bdi4jade.goal
Interface Goal

All Superinterfaces:
jade.content.Concept, jade.content.ContentElement, java.io.Serializable, jade.content.Term
All Known Subinterfaces:
InternalGoal
All Known Implementing Classes:
AchieveBlocksStacked, BeliefGoal, BeliefSetValueGoal, CompositeGoal, CompositeGoalCapability.MyGoal1, CompositeGoalCapability.MyGoal2, CompositeGoalCapability.MyGoal3, MessageGoal, ParallelGoal, PerformMove, Ping, PlanFailedCapability.MyGoal, SequentialGoal, Subgoal, TopLevelGoal
public interface Goal
extends jade.content.ContentElement, jade.content.Concept

This interface defines the abstraction of a Goal. A class that implements this class can be used as a goal from a capability and can be achieved by plans.

Author:
ingrid
